ComicInfo.Summary:
The Iron Avengers (part 15): Elephant Steve saves the Avengers from the menace of Ultron and his control over the suits of armor that Iron Man invented.
Day of the Defenders!: Dr. Strange gathers the Defenders for the first time to battle the Nameless One, but at the end of the fight both Namor and the Surfer reject the idea of a team.
ComicInfo.Title: The Iron Avengers (part 15); Day of the Defenders!
